## Loading and preprocessing the data

Load the data from the csv file and convert the date variable to the date type
```{r echo = TRUE}
data <- read.csv("activity.csv")

data[,2] <- as.Date(data[,2], "%Y-%m-%d")
```


## What is mean total number of steps taken per day?
```{r}
library(dplyr)
grouped_by_date <- group_by(data, date)
total_steps <- summarise(grouped_by_date, total_steps = sum(steps, na.rm = TRUE))

hist(total_steps$total_steps, 50, col = "red")

mean(total_steps$total_steps)

median(total_steps$total_steps)

```
